Text: Late one afternoon...

...And so, I thought that a letter alone might be a
bit boring.
Definitely.

I'm now a wage-earning member of the Knight Order, so
I'd like to help out the family, I suppose...

I mean, can't I send my parents something nice from
the royal capital every so often?
Yeah, I agree.
What's with that unenthusiastic response, hm?!

Oh, maybe it's got something to do with the fact that
you've got me by the neck trying to drag me off
against my will?

And I only do that because you turn tail and try to
run the moment you see my face, isn't that right?
I'm so sorry.
Now pull yourself together, and let's go!

Okay, I get it... I said I get it, so why're you
still dragging me...?
Aw, man, my neck is killing me.
What was that? Do you have a complaint, perhaps?
I thought not.

So about this "something nice"... Where're we gonna
find it?
Well...right over there!
Oh, isn't that...

It's this incredible shop, Mitsugoshi, that I
discovered recently.
I knew it...
Hm? Did you say something just now?

Nope, didn't make a peep. So what makes this store
so great?

While their price range is very much on the high end,
the products they stock are all unlike anything found
elsewhere.
Whoa, neat.

At any rate, I've had my eye on this store for a
while now. I'm very curious to see what it's like.

I'm sure we'll find something that will make Mother
and Father happy here.

S-So this is Mitsugoshi... It's...much more
impressive than I thought it would be.

I've never seen a larger or more extravagant
chandelier...
Seriously.

...You know, you seem awfully unfazed by all this. 
Could it be that you've actually been here before?

W-Wow. What an amazing store. That chandelier's so
shiny that I can hardly see anything.
...Right? It's truly astounding!

Well, let's get moving, Cid. Stay right beside me so
that you don't find yourself too dazzled.
Okey-dokey.

Hmm... Everything in this section looks to be
furnishings with an antique flair.
Say, what do you think of this lamp?

Looks good to me. Seems like something Mom would
like.
It really does...

Wow, they even sell frames for self-portraits. How's
this one? Don't you think Father would absolutely
love it?
Definitely...

Okay, here. There's one more thing I want to see,
so you carry it.
Wait, I gotta carry that heavy-looking thing?

You're a boy, aren't you? This will be light as a
feather for you.

Look, Cid. A decorative armor and a sword set! Isn't
it adorable?
Y-Yeah...

These would look superb in the entry hall at home. 
Let's take them with us...just in case.
But I can't hold anything else...
Again with your pathetic whining...!

Listen. I'm operating on a limited budget here. I
need to carefully examine each of these so I choose
the one that will please Mother and Father the most,
understand?

It may be a little heavy, but you'll just have to
tough it out.
Claire and Cid explore the rest of the store.
An ominous figure watches the two of them intently...
Huh...?
Hey, don't get distracted. What do you think of this?

No, it's just that I feel someone's been staring at
us for a while now...

Are you serious? Stop with the excessively self-
conscious nonsense. And more importantly, help
me decide which of these hats would look best
on Father.
But I swear that—
Congratulations, my dear customers!
Huh...?
Wha...

Thank you for gracing us with your patronage today. 
As the owner of Mitsugoshi, I am overjoyed to be able
to congratulate you on this glorious occasion.

Wh-What...? H-Hey, Cid. What exactly is happening
here?

Beats me... I don't get even a fraction of what she's
talking about.
Is something the matter?

...Well, we don't fully understand that situation.
What are you congratulating us for?

Ah, yes. As it happens, you two are the one-millionth
customers to visit us here at Mitsugoshi.

Thus we wanted to offer you a very special service! 
Please, allow me to show you to our VIP lounge!
Right this way, please!
Uh, um, what?!
*sigh* I had a feeling this'd happen...

...Now this is a surprise. I wouldn't expect such a
nice room after being practically hauled off by
force to the back of the store.

My apologies for being somewhat overenthusiastic.
Now then, please refresh yourselves with these
complimentary drinks.
What incredible hospitality.
Yeah, it really is. Mitsugoshi sure is the best...
You honor me with your praise.

So what is this "millionth customer service" you
mentioned...?

This is a catalog containing only our finest wares.
Please choose whichever you would like, and it
shall be yours as a way of saying thanks from all
of us here at Mitsugoshi.

Wh-Why, that's amazing! What a wonderful service. 
Don't you agree, Cid?
Oh, uh, yeah. It sure is...
Let's take a look at what's inside.
What?! H-Hold on just a moment!
Is something the matter?

Y-Y-You're actually going to give us these?! 
B-But...! Every product in here is unbelievably
expensive!
Of course we are.
I-I can't believe it! Can you, Cid?!

...Well, I mean this is Mitsugoshi. That's
probably just how they do things.

...Y-Yes, I suppose...so. Oh dear, look at me with my
jaw on the floor. Though... I take it you mean to say
this is normal...?

Like take this right here. You could easily build a
second home for that price. But this is Mitsugoshi
we're talking about, after all.

*gasp* Y-You're right...! They're certainly more
formidable than I had given them credit for...

It gives me great pleasure to see you perusing our
most choice products with such care.
Hahaha...

What to do... I'm not sure what criteria I should be
using to decide.

Why not just pick something you think Mother and
Father will like?

You do have a point. Can we take our time making
a choice?
But of course. Take all the time you need.

Thank you for the amazing gift today. I'm certain our
parents will be delighted.
Not at all. We eagerly await your next visit.

...Such discerning eyes, avoiding the pretense of
value to select only those items that best suit her
parents' tastes.
I would expect no less of his sister.
Huh...? What's that supposed to mean...

Yeah! That's my awesome sister for ya! She has the
best sense ever!

Y-You think so? Well, as the heir to the Kagenou
line, I suppose I must be capable of at least that
much! Hehe!
